name: data-card-11
effect: Records the number of points the trainer has earned in the Pokéathlon.
short_effect: Records the number of points the trainer has earned in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many points your Pokémon scored in the Pokéathlon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many points your Pokémon scored in the Pokéathlon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many points your Pokémon scored in the Pokéathlon.
